      # File railties/lib/rails/commands/server.rb, line 53
53:     def start
54:       puts "=> Booting #{ActiveSupport::Inflector.demodulize(server)}"
55:       puts "=> Rails #{Rails.version} application starting in #{Rails.env} on http://#{options[:Host]}:#{options[:Port]}"
56:       puts "=> Call with -d to detach" unless options[:daemonize]
57:       trap(:INT) { exit }
58:       puts "=> Ctrl-C to shutdown server" unless options[:daemonize]
59: 
60:       #Create required tmp directories if not found
61:       %(cache pids sessions sockets).each do |dir_to_make|
62:         FileUtils.mkdir_p(Rails.root.join('tmp', dir_to_make))
63:       end
64: 
65:       super
66:     ensure
67:       # The '-h' option calls exit before @options is set.
68:       # If we call 'options' with it unset, we get double help banners.
69:       puts 'Exiting' unless @options && options[:daemonize]
70:     end
